Method Detail

represent

public org.restlet.resource.Representation represent(org.restlet.resource.Variant variant)
                                              throws org.restlet.resource.ResourceException
The most important method in this class. This method - Checks for validity of input term - connects Shard to the database - calls getHomologyData(String) to execute query for homology data - calls assembleJSONObjectFromResults(List) method to assemble results of query execution into a JSON object

Overrides:
represent in class org.restlet.resource.Resource
Throws:
org.restlet.resource.ResourceException

getHomologyData

private java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String[]>> getHomologyData(java.lang.String termId)
                                                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
PURPOSE This method returns homology statements associated with the input term Id as a data structure Data is retrieved in the form\n \n

Parameters:
termId -

a data structure containing the results of the homology query execution
